rows.label: qst003101_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm a bit tied up right now.
Could this wait until later?

rows.label: qst003101_msg0002
rows.name:
Things are anything but fine.
The distribution centers have
been in a state of chaos lately.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0003
rows.name:
We were already short-staffed, and
now Acedian refugees have arrived.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0004
rows.name:
It's not just the Invidian
civilians; even us soldiers
are growing discontent.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0005
rows.name:
After an incident like
that, I know we should be
working together, but...

rows.label: qst003101_msg0006
rows.name:
For many people, especially those already
struggling to get by, the refugees from
Acedia are likely an unwelcome sight.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0007
rows.name:
There are three distribution centers
in Fons Maim, and nearly all of
them are facing problems...

rows.label: qst003101_msg0008
rows.name:
If only we had a little more breathing
room... We're just struggling to deal
with what's right in front of us.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0009
rows.name: Are you saying you'll help us?

rows.label: qst003101_msg0010
rows.name:
If you do, that would certainly
give us some much-needed relief.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0011
rows.name:
We might even be able to address
the civilians' complaints.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0012
rows.name:
But we're also low on ingredients,
so we'd have to ask for that
first... Can we leave it to you?

rows.label: qst003101_msg0013
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0014
rows.name:
As I said, there are three
distribution centers.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0015
rows.name:
This one, one at the Kvere
Battleship Repair Dock, and
another at Fons Maim Port.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0016
rows.name:
Each one has different problems. Please
ask the person in charge for details.
The one here is Velmo, next to me.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0017
rows.name:
Well then, I'm counting on you. I
might not be able to reward you much,
but we're grateful for the help.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0101
rows.name:
You're here to help with
distribution, right?

rows.label: qst003101_msg0102
rows.name:
Besides this one, there are distribution
centers at the Kvere Battleship Repair
Dock and Fons Maim Port.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0103
rows.name: We're counting on you.
